metadata.dc:description: We report a case of leiomyosarcoma of the spermatic cord that we consider singular because of the excellent outcome. The patient is alive and tumor-free 8 years following the initial diagnosis. We discuss the management of these patients, a controversial subject since there are no definitive therapeutic guidelines because of the very limited series of patients.
metadata.dc:title: Un caso de leiomiosarcoma del cord칩n esperm치tico.
[A case of leiomyosarcoma of the spermatic cord].
